title: Force System Governance and Management
description: Governance policies, quality gates, and management procedures for the Force agentic development assistance system

system_metadata.name: Force Agentic Development Assistant
system_metadata.description: Comprehensive system for recording, analyzing, and improving agentic development processes through tools, patterns, constraints, and machine learning

quality_gates.name: Tool Definition Quality Gate
quality_gates.description: Validates new tool definitions against schema and quality standards
criteria: All required properties must be present

quality_gates.name: Pattern Effectiveness Review
quality_gates.description: Reviews pattern effectiveness based on usage data and outcomes
criteria: Pattern must have documented implementation examples
Success rate must be >70% for patterns marked as stable
Pattern must show measurable benefits over alternatives

quality_gates.name: Constraint Compliance Audit
quality_gates.description: Audits system compliance with defined development constraints
criteria: All error-level constraints must have 100% compliance
Constraint violations must be tracked and analyzed

learning_policies.name: Learning Data Collection Policy
learning_policies.description: Defines what data is collected for machine learning and continuous improvement

learning_policies.name: Learning Model Update Policy
learning_policies.description: Defines how learning models are updated and validated

usage_guidelines.name: Tool Selection and Usage Guidelines
principles: Select tools based on complexity appropriateness
Prefer established tools over experimental ones for critical operations
Consider tool dependencies and resource requirements
Validate tool compatibility with current project context

usage_guidelines.name: Pattern Application Guidelines
principles: Apply patterns consistently across similar contexts
Document deviations from standard patterns with justification
Adapt patterns to specific project needs when necessary
application_process: Identify applicable patterns for current context
Evaluate pattern fit and potential benefits
Plan implementation with consideration of trade-offs

maintenance_procedures.name: Schema Evolution Procedure
maintenance_procedures.description: Process for evolving the Force schema while maintaining backward compatibility
steps: Create migration strategy for existing data
Test schema changes with existing tools
Update all tool definitions to new schema

maintenance_procedures.name: Tool Lifecycle Management
maintenance_procedures.description: Process for managing tools from creation to deprecation

reporting.name: Force System Health Report
reporting.description: Regular report on system performance, tool effectiveness, and learning progress

reporting.name: Learning Insights Report
reporting.description: Monthly analysis of learning data to identify improvement opportunities
